skills.name: Teleportation
skills.bonus: The ability to move so fast they look like they're teleporting. Could be considered to technically be Teleportation.

skills.name: Reality Warping
skills.bonus: The ability to Warp Reality. Make the impossible become possible but can't warp anything containing the structure that holds everything together (Which are many creatures.)
